wikipedia_page.main: John Shiel (13 May 1917 – 30 November 2013) was an English professional footballer, who played for North Shields, Newcastle United and Huddersfield Town. He was born in Seahouses. At the time of his death in 2013, he was the oldest former Newcastle United player.

link_mentions.page: List of Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players

response: * John Shiel (born 1917), played for Huddersfield Town
